name: Obtain Lobster!
description:
You are an aspiring chef who's in dire need of some lobster. The local store has stopped selling lobster, however, and you must now figure out why!

Controls:

-alt: Interact with characters and objects

-shift: Scroll through menus and cutscenes and access menu

-[down arrow]: Exit out of quests menu

Created by: Evan DiGiacomo, Miranda Thompson, Carter Alderman
